context: Tooth Extraction,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Cleaning,
review:
The doctor is very transparent and explains the issue well with a clear treatment advice and options with pros and cons.
Once into the treatment, she is very reliable and i have the trust in her that my teeth are in safe hands and i will be fine.
Overall, a very good experience.

The doctor was really Excellent. Explained the line of treatment very well. It's affordable and  very flexible with payment plan. I would definitely recommend this doctor for any dental issues. Will definitely let everyone know once the treatment is completely. Till date i am more than 100 percent satisfied with the doctor. Once my spouse treatment gets completed, i will also visit this doctor for myself. Don't think twice before taking an appointment here. Just go for it

review: The best thing, what he explained in detail treatment to be given, charges, how reasonable he can make for us.  What will be compulsory, life of treatment & way forward

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Very co operative. Makes us feel comfortable.
Excellent atmosphere. Good staff, highly hygiene, good co ordination

Went there to get replaced one of the cap which I already had for more than 7 years and got cracked 
They suggested me a cap that had guarantee of 10 years and also mentioned that I will be getting the card for its validity which I never received even after asking them multiple times 
Had the cap replacement and within one week I had to go back because the fit was not proper and had gap between 2 teeths 
They did some temporary filling but within one week it washed off 
Whenever I try asking for an appointment they are never available on weekends , the lady on reception says she wil confirm when the doctors will be available but never got any response from them after repeated calls
Would not recommend them at all 
They will just speak good but that's what you will get.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr.priyal is very friendly she made me feel very comfortable n her hands r really slow n soft while doing d treatment I  did not really feel d pain when she did my tooth filling.
I always go all the way to Borivali to my Dr. As I did not trust any other Dr. In Mulund but after meeting Dr.priyal I m glad that Now on wards I don't have to travel to Borivali for any of my dental problems.
Thank you Dr. Priyal

review: Dr. Pooja Shah was very friendly and explained my tooth ailment to me very well. She very carefully observed all the sanitisation practices.
great experience, hygienic place, the doctor had a very friendly approach, a little bit expensive but worth the money
